title: Gimli, Dwarf of Erebor (1U12)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Dwarf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	Damage +1. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add (2) to place a card from hand beneath your draw deck.
Lore:	“Gimli now walked ahead by the wizard's side, so eager was he to come to Moria.”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
